content:
Based on cuisine, price point, ratings, and reviews, 5 restaurants in San Francisco similar to Perilla are:

1. Slanted Door: Modern Vietnamese cuisine, high-end pricing, excellent ratings, and rave reviews.
2. An the Go: Vietnamese street food, affordable pricing, great ratings, and positive reviews.
3. The Chairman: Asian fusion street food, mid-range pricing, excellent ratings, and positive reviews.
4. Rooster & Rice: Modern Vietnamese cuisine, mid-range pricing, great ratings, and favorable reviews.
5. Bodega Bistro: Authentic Vietnamese cuisine, mid-range pricing, excellent ratings, and positive reviews. All 5 restaurants offer Vietnamese-inspired cuisine with creative twists, using fresh and flavorful ingredients, earning them positive reviews from diners.
